about_the_game:
Jimmu | 神武 is a challenging Japanese horror-themed boss hunting game that takes place in Japan centuries ago. The game features a non-linear open-world with some RPG elements.

From the creators of







You play as a protagonist named Jimmu who wakes up on an island and finds that the island is cursed with evil creatures. Something big attacks you on the way to a village you saw from a distance. Fortunately, you barely survived the attack and were able to enter the village.


Key Features:
Open-world (Island)
Non-linear gameplay
RPG elements (skill system, financial system, etc)
Save system
No hand holding
Many enemies and bosses
Japanese horror-themed suspenseful atmosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel/Amd
  • Graphics: Nvidia/Amd
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
  • Additional Notes: Pretty scary
